About

Renge is designed by Junchao (www.junchaowang.com), inspired by the amination called “のんのんびより” and named by one of the Characters, Renge Miyauchi (宮内 れんげ). If you have any questions, you can reach me via Renge on GitHub by submitting an issue or via email billyfish152[at]gmail.com.
